languages.text: {n}Кассия прячет растерянную улыбку за краешком шали.{/n} "Я... Вы слишком добры ко мне, Лорд-капитан. Позвольте в ответ отметить и ваши... красивые..." {n}Паника и растерянность перебивает ваше дыхание, отражаясь зеркалом в глазах Кассии.{/n} "Плечи? Да, плечи... Кхм. Прошу, сменим тему".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия прячет растерянную улыбку за краешком шали.{/n} "Я... Вы слишком добры ко мне, Лорд-капитан. Позвольте в ответ отметить и ваши... красивые..." {n}Паника и растерянность перебивает ваше дыхание, отражаясь зеркалом в глазах Кассии.{/n} "Плечи? Да, плечи... Кхм. Прошу, сменим тему".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia hides an awkward smile behind the edge of her shawl.{/n} "I— you are much too kind to me, Lord Captain. Allow me, for my part, to note the... beauty of your—" {n}You become breathless with panic and bewilderment, which are mirrored in Cassia's eyes.{/n} "—shoulders? Yes, your shoulders... Ahem. Pray let us change the subject."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅将她尴尬的微笑藏在了披肩之后。{/n}“我——你对我实在是太亲切了，舰长大人。也请允许我……欣赏你身上的美吧……你的——”{n}你感觉自己仿佛喘不过气来，心中充满了惊慌与困惑。这些感情也都流露在了卡西娅的眼中。{/n}“——肩膀？是啊，没错，你的肩膀很美……咳，咱们还是换个话题吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia hides an awkward smile behind the edge of her shawl.{/n} "I— you are much too kind to me, Lord Captain. Allow me, for my part, to note the... beauty of your—" {n}You become breathless with panic and bewilderment, which are mirrored in Cassia's eyes.{/n} "—shoulders? Yes, your shoulders... Ahem. Pray let us change the subject."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Pray let us change the subject."

languages.text: {n}Cassia oculta una sonrisa tímida con el borde de su chal.{/n} «Yo... es demasiado amable conmigo, Lord Capitán. Por mi parte, permítame destacar la... belleza de sus...». {n}Te falta el aliento y sientes un pánico y una perplejidad que ves reflejados en los ojos de Cassia.{/n} «... ¿hombros? Sí, sus hombros... Ejem. Creo que será mejor cambiar de tema».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia hides an awkward smile behind the edge of her shawl.{/n} "I— you are much too kind to me, Lord Captain. Allow me, for my part, to note the... beauty of your—" {n}You become breathless with panic and bewilderment, which are mirrored in Cassia's eyes.{/n} "—shoulders? Yes, your shoulders... Ahem. Pray let us change the subject."

Por mi parte, permítame destacar la... belleza de sus...». {n}Te falta el aliento y sientes un pánico y una perplejidad que ves reflejados en los ojos de Cassia.{/n} «... ¿hombros? Sí, sus hombros... Ejem. Creo que será mejor cambiar de tema».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはショールの端にぎこちない笑みを隠した。{/n}「その…あなたはあまりにも優しいのです、ロード・キャプテン。私からも、あなたの…その…美しさを…」{n}あなたはパニックと困惑で息苦しくなり、それはカシアの目にも映っていた。{/n}「…肩？ええ、あなたの肩が…コホン。話題を変えましょうか」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia hides an awkward smile behind the edge of her shawl.{/n} "I— you are much too kind to me, Lord Captain. Allow me, for my part, to note the... beauty of your—" {n}You become breathless with panic and bewilderment, which are mirrored in Cassia's eyes.{/n} "—shoulders? Yes, your shoulders... Ahem. Pray let us change the subject."

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia versteckt ein verschämtes Grinsen hinter ihrem Schal.{/n} "Ich ... Ihr seid zu gütig, Lord Captain. Gestattet mir meinerseits zu bemerken, ich bewundere die ... Schönheit Eurer"{n}, du kannst kaum atmen vor Panik und Verblüffung, die sich in Cassias Augen widerspiegeln,{/n} "Schultern? Ja, Eurer Schultern ... Ähem. Wechseln wir vielleicht das Thema."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia hides an awkward smile behind the edge of her shawl.{/n} "I— you are much too kind to me, Lord Captain. Allow me, for my part, to note the... beauty of your—" {n}You become breathless with panic and bewilderment, which are mirrored in Cassia's eyes.{/n} "—shoulders? Yes, your shoulders... Ahem. Pray let us change the subject."

Schönheit Eurer"{n}, du kannst kaum atmen vor Panik und Verblüffung, die sich in Cassias Augen widerspiegeln,{/n} "Schultern? Ja, Eurer Schultern ... Ähem. Wechseln wir vielleicht das Thema."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia cache un sourire gêné derrière son châle.{/n} « Je... Vous êtes trop aimable, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Permettez-moi de souligner la... beauté de vos... » {n}{mf|Pris|Prise} de panique et {mf|plongé|plongée} dans la confusion, sentiments que vous pouvez lire dans le regard de Cassia, vous commencez à avoir du mal à respirer normalement.{/n} « ... épaules ? Oui, vos épaules... Hum. Changeons de sujet, voulez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia hides an awkward smile behind the edge of her shawl.{/n} "I— you are much too kind to me, Lord Captain. Allow me, for my part, to note the... beauty of your—" {n}You become breathless with panic and bewilderment, which are mirrored in Cassia's eyes.{/n} "—shoulders? Yes, your shoulders... Ahem. Pray let us change the subject."

Permettez-moi de souligner la... beauté de vos... » {n}{mf|Pris|Prise} de panique et {mf|plongé|plongée} dans la confusion, sentiments que vous pouvez lire dans le regard de Cassia, vous commencez à avoir du mal à respirer normalement.{/n} « ... épaules ? Oui, vos épaules... Hum. Changeons de sujet, voulez-vous ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, şalının ardına saklanıp çekinceyle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ben... Bana karşı çok kibarsın Lord Kaptan. Müsaadenle ben de belirteyim ki... Senin de şeyin çok güzel..." {n}Nefesin panik ve şaşkınlık içinde kesiliyor. Aynısını Cassia'nın gözlerinde de görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Omuzların. Evet, omuzların... Neyse. Yalvarırım bu konuyu kapatalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia hides an awkward smile behind the edge of her shawl.{/n} "I— you are much too kind to me, Lord Captain. Allow me, for my part, to note the... beauty of your—" {n}You become breathless with panic and bewilderment, which are mirrored in Cassia's eyes.{/n} "—shoulders? Yes, your shoulders... Ahem. Pray let us change the subject."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, eşarbının ardına saklanıp çekinerek gülümsüyor.{/n} "Şey... Çok kibarsın Lord Kaptan. Müsaadenle ben de belirteyim ki... Senin de şeyin çok güzel...{n}Panik ve şaşkınlık içinde nefes nefese kalıyorsun. Aynısını Cassia'nın gözlerinde de görebiliyorsun.{/n} "...Omuzların. Evet, omuzların... Neyse. Yalvarırım bu konuyu kapatalım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
